> You ought to learn some C/C++ and join the OpenGlad
 project or something.

Very funny.  I thought I was helping the OpenGlad project by putting 
out those little problems.

Anyways, I have contributed some and do plan on contributing more to 
OpenGlad.

When I get a chance, I do plan on doing some work with the operations 
of the Smoother Program in the scenario creator.  I have already 
ported out the entire Smoother Program into a Visual Basic program, 
and I started work on a Random Object Generator for Gladiator maps.  I 
gotta do some more work on that.  I was working integrating graphics 
into my Random Object Generator for gladiator maps and improving the 
intelligence of placing objects a bit.

The slowest bit of upgrading the intelligence is working out exactly 
how much space each object takes on the map so I can avoid placing 
some objects on top of each other.
